summary: The Florentine Letters (COMPLETE) Oxford University, June, 1935.         The edge of summer has just begun to dawn over the...
caption:
The Florentine Letters (COMPLETE)

Oxford University,
June, 1935.

        The edge of summer has just begun to dawn over the university campus, exams are almost over and the dust is just beginning to settle over the desks.
        Harry Styles, in the last years of his PHD study of The Renaissance, has managed to maintain a safe existence within the walls of his books and classes and late night romances. He’s made a place that’s safe from the expectations of high brow society and the cold stare of his father.
        That is, until an all too sharp, all too witty, and all too handsome man walks into his life.
        Louis, the cocky man with the smile, brings with him a strange object - declaring that it’s a puzzle piece from the one and only Leonardo Da Vinci. He speaks of age old mysteries, and puzzles that cannot be solved without Harry’s help. Immediately, Harry is quite literally swept off his feet, and together they take their chances on the find of a life time - Da Vinci’s lost works.
        But what Louis doesn’t mention is the high stakes game of cat and mouse that comes with chasing things that do not belong to you. A game where nothing, and no one, is as they seem.

AKA: Harry is a PHD History student and Louis is the treasure hunter that sweeps him into an easy romance, set against the French/Italian summer. Hijinks and action ensue. 

Would recommend to fans of Indiana Jones, Tomb Raider, The Mummy, The Da Vinci Code, all that good shit.

Harry Styles/Louis Tomlinson 
Rated: Explicit
Word count: 118k
READ NOW

summary: Beautiful Thing
title: Beautiful Thing
body:
Without you here I am boring. Something inside you is triggering, it makes me myself, makes me funny. You’re a beautiful thing.

11

Never would I had thought that I would wake up next to Harry Styles in the morning. It was always a fantasy of mine I had when I went through my… I guess you can call it, “Missing Harry” phase; but…

Read more…

summary: since not many ppl showed interested in my latest chaptered story idea (thank to those who are, ilysm!), i thought it would be...
body:
since not many ppl showed interested in my latest chaptered story idea (thank to those who are, ilysm!), i thought it would be time for me to write? so what should i write? 

part 3 of fratboy!Niall? (part 1 / part 2) 

orrr 

part 3 of my Harry/Niall/Y/N threesome? (part 1 / part 2) 

or just a few requests i got? 

or maybe one of my Harry fics like Bruises? or Bittersweet? 

or even one of my chaptered fics? (i doubt anyone will pick that but if anyone’s interested heres my masterlist and i update mostly AM Conversations and Meant To Be but im open to suggestions)

summary: Sweet Passion
title: Sweet Passion
body:
‘You are so sweet, you’re giving me stomach ache and cavities’ ~Harry Styles

Chapter 1: Alien abduction and Hogwarts

I stared at the huge, chalk board covered in messy handwritings and formulas.I was pissed, angry, mad, outraged, offended, vexed, wrathed… (you get the point) What kind of savage person would do…

Read more…

tags: my take on why harry doesnt say hes going back to 1D
summary: Harry has always spoken respectfully of One Direction and their music I think he just gets frustrated (rightfully so) that he’s...
body:
Harry has always spoken respectfully of One Direction and their music I think he just gets frustrated (rightfully so) that he’s been so successful as a solo artist and all he ever hears is questions about when his solo career will end and he’ll go back to the band. I think that as much as he appreciates his time in One Direction he wishes that he could just be appreciated for his image now. HIS image. Not the image he shares with four other people, not the image that calls him a womaniser. Not the image forced on him by management. An image that he created, and is so proud of.

I miss them too, but let them have this

summary: imagine being casted in a romcom with harry styles as your co-star, and slowly falling in love with each other because you’re...
body: imagine being casted in a romcom with harry styles as your co-star, and slowly falling in love with each other because you’re both genuinely kind and physically affectionate so you are always saying good morning to everyone and always touching on each other even though you two haven’t even thought of the idea of being more than friends, so once filming ends and all the interviews and promos start people start noticing all the little touches you do and the loving looks you exchange but you two are still oblivious to how in love you are with each other.

tags: when you realize you're in too deep and can't expose yourself like that
summary: i met a harry stan at the beyonce concert the other day and we started talking about harry’s suits and she was like “you follow...
body: i met a harry stan at the beyonce concert the other day and we started talking about harry’s suits and she was like “you follow him on insta right? that sparkly one was amazing” and i had to stop myself from being too weird and being like “which sparkly suit, the bangkok one or the milan one or the london one or do you mean the sparkly shirts???”
